# Extract final counts of 'srr' standards from the report

## Description

Extract final counts of 'srr' standards from the report

## Usage

```r
srr_counts_from_report(srr_rep)
```

## Arguments

* `srr_rep`: An 'srr' report generated by the `srr::srr_report()` function.

## Seealso

Other ropensci: 
`[check_issue_template](check_issue_template)()`,
`[is_user_authorized](is_user_authorized)()`,
`[push_to_gh_pages](push_to_gh_pages)()`,
`[readme_has_peer_review_badge](readme_has_peer_review_badge)()`,
`[srr_counts](srr_counts)()`,
`[srr_counts_summary](srr_counts_summary)()`,
`[stats_badge](stats_badge)()`

## Concept

ropensci

## Value

Character vector with markdown-formatted summary summary of numbers
of standards complied with.
